bibl.title: From Scholars to Scholia. Chapters in the History of Ancient Greek Scholarship.
bibl.note: The volume springs in part from the colloquium entitled La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica, organized by Fr.M. (September 2008) at the Fondation Hardt in Vandoeuvres (Geneva). 5 contributions. - Pp. vii-xi: Preface (Fr.M. and L.P.); - 163-189: Bibliography; - 191-205: General Index.
bibl.seg: Montanari Franco and Lara Pagani (Edd.), From Scholars to Scholia. Chapters in the History of Ancient Greek Scholarship. (Trends in Classics. Supplementary Volumes. 9.)
Berlin - New York, W. de Gruyter, 2011, 8Â°, xii-205 pp. ISBN 978-3-11-025162-3. $112.

The volume springs in part from the colloquium entitled La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica, organized by Fr.M. (September 2008) at the Fondation Hardt in Vandoeuvres (Geneva). 5 contributions. - Pp. vii-xi: Preface (Fr.M. and L.P.); - 163-189: Bibliography; - 191-205: General Index.
